actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-979.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report and amendments reported from conference in disagreement on the bill H.R. 6040, making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 6040 (supplemental appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report and amendments reported from conference in disagreement on the bill H.R. 6040, making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1984, and for other purposes.
